name: JAZARI - Pakistan's 1st 3d Printed Humanoid Robot
desc: JAZARI is Pakistan's 1st ever completely 3d printed humanoid robot. It was made

name: Weeding Machine - Agricultural Robot
desc: Pakistan's 1st weeding robot made in collaboration with german recearch center for artificial intelligence. The robot is designed to detect unwanted weed plants using computer vision and elimnate them with pricise laser module.

name: Reverse Vending Machine
desc: The reverse vending machine was designed to encourage pet bottle collection by rewarding users with cashable points against plastic.

name: Kinetic Display
desc: A moving display made with motors and lights.

name: Energy Metering Device
desc: We made this portable energy meter to record electricty consumption which was also recorded on cloud

name: SoS Emergency Alarm Device
desc: The device was made as prototype for engro.
